verses.text: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
verses.sacredNames: In the beginning ELOHIM created the heaven and the earth.

verses.text: And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
verses.sacredNames: And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the RUACH of ELOHIM moved upon the face of the waters.

verses.text: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.
verses.sacredNames: And ELOHIM said, Let there be light: and there was light.
